message: Let's split the money 60/40.  It's a fair deal that gives us both a good share.
I think a 51/49 split is more fair, considering the inflation affects me more.  Let's be reasonable and work together to get something out of this.
Bob, I understand the inflation puts you at a disadvantage, but your last offer was too far in your favor.  Let's meet in the middle with a 55/45 split. This ensures we both benefit.
